resources.string: Selezionare per abilitare il tema scuro
Scegli la dimensione del testo dei messaggi
Selezionare per abilitare la paginazione veloce
Selezionare per abilitare il tema scuro nella risposta rapida (solo Jelly Bean)
Dopo aver cambiato il tema, l\'applicazione deve essere riavviata.
Scegliere il colore della barra del titolo
Per gli utenti che non hanno Jelly Bean, aggiunge una risposta rapida che viene visualizzata automaticamente quando un nuovo messaggio viene ricevuto
Selezionare per visualizzare la barra del titolo
Sostituire con ? tutti i caratteri non supportati nel messaggio SMS da 160 caratteri
Selezionare il numero di messaggi che devono essere caricati inizialmente
Limita la quantità di messaggi inizialmente caricati
Tira per caricare tutti i messaggi
Sovrascrivi applicazione di gestione SMS del produttore
Salva i messaggi nella lista in arrivo e interrompe la trasmisisone ad altre applicazioni di gestione SMS, fermando le notifiche. Abilitare solo se avete disinstallato l\'applicazione del produttore.
Apri la lista dei contatti all\'avvio
Selezionare il numero di conversazioni che devono essere caricate inizialmente
Mittente e testo del messaggio non vengono visualizzate nella notifica
Mostra il bottone visualizza conversazione in basso, nel pop up di risposta rapida
Solo versione Pro, comprala dal Play Store. Attualmente il supporto della versione free è limitato
Mostra solo il numero di telefono quando cerchi un contatto per un nuovo messaggio
Scegli il colore del LED di notifica
Scegli il pattern di vibrazione per le nuove notifiche
Mostra il bottone per gli smile sulla tastiera
Accende il display quando arriva una nuova notifica
Sblocca il dispositivo quando arriva una nuova notifica
Seleziona come devono essere gli smile
Seleziona i bottoni che devono essere visualizzati nelle notifica
Nascondi la Scheda dei Messaggi quando scorri
Spunta per nascondere completamente la scheda dei messaggi quando scorri a destra o sinistra
Disabilita i menù scorrevoli a destra e sinistra, possono essere aperti usando i bottoni in alto
Apre automaticamente la tastiera quando l\'app viene avviata
Barra del Titolo con Lettere Maiuscole
Se spuntata, visualizza i nomi nella barra del titolo tutti con lettere maiuscole
Immagini del Contatto nella Barra del Titolo
Visualizza nella barra del titolo della coversazione selezionata l\'icona del contatto
Scegli uno sfondo personalizzato da applicare al menù scorrevole
Scegli uno sfondo personalizzato da applicare ai messaggi
ATTENZIONE: Verranno cancellati TUTTI i messaggi in TUTTE le conversazioni.\n\nVuoi cancellare tutte le conversazioni?
Scegli un colore da impostare per i messaggi inviati
Scegli un colore da impostare per i messaggi ricevuti
Choose a color to set as the menu text color
Imposta l\'opacità dei messaggi (per consentire la corretta visualizzazione anche con sfondi personalizzati)
Displays new messages to your lockscreen

Credit to jfeinstein10 on GitHub for SlidingMenu library, attenzione on GitHub for ColorPickerPreference library, nhaarman on Github for ListViewAnimations library, Roman Nurik for his Wizard Pager, chrisbanes on Github for the ActionBar-PullToRefresh libary, Hai Bison on Google Code for the Lock Pattern library, and to all of the translators.
Choose how delivery reports should be displayed
Check to always show new message count, even if it is zero
Force contact information to always be shown in the Action Bar, even when title bar is enabled
Select the animation to be displayed when messages are sent
Select the animation to be displayed when messages are received
Number of SMS messages to keep
Number of MMS messages to keep
Choose a color to set as the contact name\'s text color
Creates notification that allows you to text any contact without leaving your current app
Tap to open quick text dialog
Experimental: Will help to increase initial startup time, does not affect battery life
Please check the \"Override Stock Messaging\" option if you wish for this to work correctly. If you get a force close after enabling, just uninstall and reinstall and it will work properly again.
Caching Data (Could take a while depending on amount of messages)
1) Select a preset theme (you can edit this theme by going to Menu -> Edit Theme)
2) Select Menu -> Add Theme and create a new theme by editing those values
- The delete option will delete the current preview (as long as it isn\'t a default theme)
-To get more themes, go to Menu -> Get More Themes
-To set a custom font (applies to all themes) go to Menu -> Custom Font
Please Note: if you select any theme other than one of the first three (Light, Dark, or Pitch Black), these themes will override any other theme settings you have set.
Pro users will be able to apply and use any theme you download, but to edit and add themes, you must download the Theme Engine
Select custom font to be displayed throughout app

Sliding Messaging now supports fully customizable themes!

Features:
 - 16 different themeable items
 - Select from any color you want or choose a holo preset
 - Edit lots of previously not themeable elements
 - Share and get new themes online
 - Select a custom font off of your external storage

For more information on the newly refined theme editor, go to Settings -> Custom Theme Settings -> Menu -> Help

Sliding Messaging Pro is now out of the beta stages!

CDMA Users, remember to check the "Split SMS" option in Advanced Settings to send long messages.

If you experience lag when sliding between conversations, you can enable the option in advanced settings to "Cache Conversations". This may affect battery life.
Will cause the icon displayed on the status bar to flash on and off. Only applies to white stock icon

Sliding Messaging has found that Go SMS is installed. Please note that Go SMS blocks notifications from other messaging apps by default, meaning that you will not receive any notifications from this app at all. You can disable this by going into Go SMS Settings -> Advanced Settings -> Receive Settings and uncheck the \"Disable other message notification\" setting.
Recommended to also disable contact pictures or UI glitches may occur, unless you are running Android 4.2+
Will convert messages to multiple recipients automatically to MMS group messages. Works best on Android 4.2+
Will send messages longer then the desired number of SMS messages as a single MMS instead
Number of SMS messages required to instead send as one MMS message
The state of threads and recipients is inconsistent.

Either there is an error in your APN settings, you haven\'t configured them yet, they are for some reason incompatible, or you are connected to WiFi and haven\'t checked the WiFi workaround option in MMS settings. \n\nDue to limitations implemented by Google in Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich),
Google now restricts Sliding Messaging\'s access to the system defined APNs for \"security reasons.\" Because of this, you will need to set the values manually if you
wish to be able to send MMS messages through Sliding Messaging. You can find APN settings for your carrier by going into your System Settings -> Wireless and Networks ->
More… -> Mobile Networks -> Access Point Names and selecting the APN from there that you wish to use, copying the \"MMSC\", \"MMS Proxy\", and \"MMS Port\" values

into Sliding Messaging\'s MMS Settings which you can access through the main settings menu or by selecting the button below. You can also find them through a quick Google search of your carrier name and apn information.\n\n
Until you have correctly set these values, you will not be able to send MMS messages.
Hides the sender name in the dashclock widget
Each number needs to be followed by a comma and space. Example \"0, 400, 100, 400\". The pattern alternates by turning vibrator off and then on for each length specified in milliseconds
Sliding Messaging also has a Pro version available with tons more features! These features include:\n

-Ability to send and view MMS and group messages
-Share dialog to share content such as web links, etc
-6 additional theme choices

-Ability to choose background images for conversation menu and message list
-Custom text color options
-Custom animations
-And tons more!
Pro users also get updates more often and access to all of the latest features.
If you get errors when attempting to send MMS, it is most likely because the APNs that you entered are incorrect or not yet compatible or you are on WiFi which could mess with the connection.
Please email me at jklinker1@gmail.com with your confirmed working APNs and carrier name so I can add them to the app
Some carriers require MMS requests with a username and password, if this is the case for your carrier, set these values
APN username. May need to be set to null
APN password. May need to be set to null
May or may not work and may need some manual editing
Select your carrier from a list a preset APNs to make life a little easier
Enables or disables cards at the top of each message list
Display Call Button for Contact Cards
Enables or disables the call button on the conversation list contact cards
Display Contact Names in Action Bar
Draws cards without drop shadow and may help improve performance
Quickly fling from the left side of screen to open conversation list
Quickly fling from the right side of screen to compose a new message
Distance from side of screen you must start your fling from to activate gesture (by % of screen space)
To activate these gestures, start a quick swipe on the side of your screen toward the middle. To quickly move between pages, start your swipe in the middle and move toward either side.
Represents the distance you must move your finger from start to end to activate fling
Represents the speed you must move your finger to activate fling
Select how often you want to be reminded of a new message
Workaround: Will temporaraly disable WiFi when sending MMS and then attempt to restore connection once complete.
Hides the phone number of each contact in the conversation list
Shows the keyboard when the popup is on screen automatically
Add more quick templates in Settings -> Manage Quick Templates
Message will be sent with the return key instead of adding a return
For use with custom ROMs with multiwindow functionality only. Will launch full app in multiwindow mode instead of just the popup when notification received
Choose flashing LED color. Be aware your LED may not support all colors
Displays date as a tiny font size instead of slightly smaller then message text size
Hide notifications but still save messages from this contact
Hide notifications and don\'t save messages from this contact
Saves some data such as individual notifications and blacklist settings to the external SD card instead of internally
Will split messages into compatible lengths. For use if you have trouble sending long messages with your carrier
Will move action bar to top of screen on card layout
Loads 15 conversations on app startup instead of all to decrease load time

Compresses Images to be sent more easily over your mobile data connection. If disabled, pictures will be sent at higher resolutions. Please be aware many carriers do not support sending at higher resolutions and you may get errors.
Sends MMS messages through the stock messaging app, useful if you have problems configuring Sliding Messaging to send
The test notification will be shown when you turn off the screen.

If you are having problems with messages not being saved, or you have disabled all other messaging apps on your device except Sliding Messaging, be sure to check the \"Override Stock Messaging\" option in Advanced Settings.
Only applicable when using the new popup
Check to enable security at startup.
Length of time between password lockouts
Attempt to automatically unlock the app after the set number of characters has been reached.
Follow the app on Twitter for updates and future innovations! \nhttp://www.twitter.com/SlidingSMS
This will override all previous backups.
Does not allow Sliding Messaging to save MMS messages, allowing your stock app to do so instead, even if you have check the \"Override Stock Messaging\" option.
Will automatically insert draft into message entry box if present. If disabled, you will get a popup box to choose whether or not to insert each draft
Will play sound when message has sent
Caches conversations in the background to allow for faster loading times, has potential to affect battery life. This feature is still experimental.
Sets the number of conversations to be cached and quickly loaded at application startup and in the background

PLEASE READ: Enabling this will greatly increase the speed of Sliding Messaging, it will also backup all your SMS messages to an external service for safekeeping and delete them from the SMS database. You will not be able to see these messages in Sliding Messaging or any other messaging app.
WARNING: May backup and delete unread messages if scheduled before they are seen.
Keep the last day in the manifest so that you have only those messages after the backup and delete
RECOMMENDED: this will delete all messages after backup is complete to increase speed and fluidity of Sliding Messaging.
